title: Problem with Authenticating
body: I have a problem with lol. It is not just with authenticating but if i get in client my client lagging so much if i make it in game, i have lags but my ping is normal. I try reinstal lol and repair, And sudenlly its okey but than this problem come again....Pleas help me :(

replies.body: I have same problem. And than i finally go in game and then i got many of bug (ping was fine). Riot can you do something about it ?!!? This is insane. I dont know why are you trying new things if you are not 100% sure about it.
They wount, i type everyone and noone respond so yea i will quit lol obiusly

Sounds like you might have some background processes that aren't stopping, so they're interfering with the important ones. Try logging out of LoL, opening Task Manager, and then closing out all LoL related processes in the list. Once you do that, log back in and see if the authentication and the client run any faster or if it works exactly the same. If it doesn't help, just let me know, I'll see if there are any other steps we can try. :)
http://prntscr.com/fnyg1u look at this. mby is with server something wrong?
